title: Finance Ministry, Sebi To Take Call On Relaxation In LIC Meeting Minimum Public Holding Norm: DIPAM Secretary - Outlook India
content: Finance Ministry, Sebi To Take Call On Relaxation In LIC Meeting Minimum Public Holding Norm: DIPAM Secretary  Outlook India
description: The government expects to raise around Rs 21,000 crore from LIC IPO, which values the state-owned insurer at Rs 6 lakh crore.
